name: ZS - Arms Sage
text:
If you control exactly 1 Level 4 monster, except "ZS - Arms Sage" (and no other monsters), you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). A "Utopia" Xyz Monster that was Summoned using this card on the field as material gains the following effect. You can only use the preceding effect of "ZS - Arms Sage" once per turn.
? If it is Xyz Summoned: You can add 1 "ZW -" monster from your Deck to your hand.
